title: 7-hour water cut for Kotte tonight (4)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The National Water Supply and Drainage Board said that the water supply to many areas including Nugegoda will be suspended for 7 hours from 10.00 P.M today (4) to the next day at 5.00 AM.

The water supply to Athulukotte, Pitakotte, Beddagana, Mirihana, Madiwela, Thalapathpitiya, Udahamulla, Ambuldeniya, Pagoda to Wijerama Junction and the 7th pillar junction of the High Level Road will be suspended during the same period.
The water supply to all by roads from Nugegoda Junction to Nawala University will be suspended during the relevant period.

In the meantime, the National Water Supply and Drainage Board told that water will be provided to several areas in Colombo under low pressure for 9 hours from 9.00 Pm today (4) to the next day at 6.00 AM.
Accordingly, water will be supplied to Colombo 1, 2, 3, 4, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, and Kaduwela areas under low pressure.
